name: Chicken Sausage Gnocchi Skillet
author: Dave Niezabitowski Sr.
summary: A light-tasting dish with mild flavors that is quick to prepare as long as you prep the gnocchi in advance.
ingredients: 2  chicken sausage links (such as Aidells®), sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook gnocchi in the boiling water until they float to the top, 2 to 4 minutes
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add broccoli, cover, and steam until tender, 4 to 5 minutes
Melt 1 teaspoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Add 1 tablespoon onion and 1 teaspoon garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 2 minutes
Add sausage; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes
Melt 1/2 cup butter in another skillet
Add remaining 1 tablespoon onion, 2 teaspoons garlic, and flour; cook and stir until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes
Combine sausage mixture and gnocchi mixture; season with salt and pepper
